byline.contributor: Diane Cardwell reported from Austin, Tex., and Matt Higgins from Buffalo.
byline.original: By DIANE CARDWELL and MATT HIGGINS

abstract: Surfing parks, including NLand Surf Park in Austin, Tex, are springing up around country, offering custom-designed artificial waves for competitions, training and recreation; new branch of surfing industry, aided by advances in wave-making technology, could broaden appeal and profitability of sport.

headline.main: Surf’s Up, and the Ocean Is Nowhere in Sight

snippet: A water park offering artificial waves in the Hill Country of Texas is part of a movement to bring surfing to the landlocked masses....
lead_paragraph: A water park offering artificial waves in the Hill Country of Texas is part of a movement to bring surfing to the landlocked masses.
